name: ルミナスアーク2 ウィル オリジナル・サウンドトラック
summary:
Unlimited World -Luminous Arc 2 will Theme Song-

Vocal: KΛNΛ
Lyrics: Yukiko Mitsui
Music: ISEPPE
Arrange: HΛL
Guitar & Programming: Takehito Shimizu

Add Programming: Mayuko Maruyama
Violin & Viola: Tsukasa Kasuya (粕谷 吏)
Chorus: Mikiko Sato (佐藤 美記子)
Sound Produce: HΛL

Yoko Shimomura
Akari Kaida
Yoshino Aoki

Location:

Sound Producer:
